languages.text: "Как вы могли заметить, мы здесь благодаря Ирлиэт".

traits.locale_text: "Как вы могли заметить, мы здесь благодаря Ирлиэт".

languages.text: "As you may have noticed, we're here because of Yrliet."
languages.original_text: "Как вы могли заметить, мы здесь благодаря Ирлиэт".

traits.locale_text: "As you may have noticed, we're here because of Yrliet."
"As you may have noticed, we're here because of Yrliet."
"As you may have noticed, we're here because of Yrliet."
"As you may have noticed, we're here because of Yrliet."
"As you may have noticed, we're here because of Yrliet."

languages.text: “或许你已经注意到了，我们之所以会被困在这里，都是因为伊莉耶特。”
languages.original_text: "As you may have noticed, we're here because of Yrliet."

traits.locale_text: “或许你已经注意到了，我们之所以会被困在这里，都是因为伊莉耶特。”

languages.text: «Imagino que se ha dado cuenta, pero estamos aquí por Yrliet».
languages.original_text: "As you may have noticed, we're here because of Yrliet."

traits.locale_text: «Imagino que se ha dado cuenta, pero estamos aquí por Yrliet».

languages.text: 「気付いているかも知れないが、私がここに来たのはユリエットのためだ」
languages.original_text: "As you may have noticed, we're here because of Yrliet."

traits.locale_text: 「気付いているかも知れないが、私がここに来たのはユリエットのためだ」

languages.text: "Wie Euch vielleicht nicht entgangen ist, sind hier wegen Yrliet hier."
languages.original_text: "As you may have noticed, we're here because of Yrliet."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Euch vielleicht nicht entgangen ist, sind hier wegen Yrliet hier."

languages.text: « Vous avez sans doute remarqué que nous sommes là à cause d'Yrliet. »
languages.original_text: "As you may have noticed, we're here because of Yrliet."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez sans doute remarqué que nous sommes là à cause d'Yrliet. »

languages.text: "Fark etmişsindir herhâlde... Buralara Yrliet yüzünden düştük."
languages.original_text: "As you may have noticed, we're here because of Yrliet."

traits.locale_text: "Fark etmişsindir herhâlde... Buralara Yrliet yüzünden düştük."
